Package model

Class Individual

java.lang.Object
model.game.Individual
public class Individual
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents an individual member of the population.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static double CHANCE_OF_DEATH
    The chance of death for an individual that is infected with disease

    • move

      public void move​(int x_limit, int y_limit)
      This function is called each step to compute the direction and the distance traveled by an individual. It also checks for direction change.
      Parameters:
      x_limit - The width of the canvas (representing the space available to the individuals).
      y_limit - The height of the canvas (representing the space available to the individuals).
      See Also:
      changeDirection(int, int)

    • changeDirection

      private void changeDirection​(int x_limit, int y_limit)
      Checks if the individual reached a bound of the canvas, and changes the direction accordingly.
      Parameters:
      x_limit - The width of the canvas (representing the space available to the individuals).
      y_limit - The height of the canvas (representing the space available to the individuals).

    • collideWith

      public boolean collideWith​(Individual i2)
      Checks for a collision with another individual. The +1 is here to solve an edge case.
      Parameters:
      i2 - The other individual.
      Returns:
      True if there is a collision, false otherwise.

    • update

      public void update​(int x_limit, int y_limit, boolean containment)
      This function is called each step, for each individual. It takes care of checking the state of the individual, moving it and changing its state.
      Parameters:
      x_limit - The width of the canvas (representing the space available to the individuals).
      y_limit - The height of the canvas (representing the space available to the individuals).
      See Also:
      move(int, int)
